response.answer_text: The short answer is yes, we have them now. Are you thinking of robots in the form of Terminator perhaps? There are many robots at the present time it is that we don’t really see them unless you are in industry like the car industry where these are often assembling cars or painting them. Yes we will have because we have had for sometime as to terminator type robots? Perhaps only time will tell.

Yes. They are used to assemble cars an lots of other industrial processes. They won’t be the humanoid ones though. There’s no point. Just as when steam power was being developed for trains, they built a locomotive rather than a steam horse!
